definitions.definition: a solid-hoofed plant-eating domesticated mammal with a flowing mane and tail, used for riding, racing, and to carry and pull loads.
examples: mount, charger, cob, nag; Morepony; foal, yearling, colt, stallion, gelding, mare, filly; bronco; datedstepper; archaicsteed "Nadine boards and grooms horses"Morepony; foal, yearling, colt, stallion, gelding, mare, filly; bronco; stepper; steed Nadine boards and grooms horses

definitions.definition: an adult male horse; a stallion or gelding.
a wild mammal of the horse family.
a frame or structure on which something is mounted or supported, especially a sawhorse.
a horizontal bar, rail, or rope in the rigging of a sailing ship for supporting something.
short for pommel horse or vaulting horse.
provide (a person or vehicle) with a horse or horses.
